content.rendered:
Learn How to Create a Well-Rounded Business Plan

2017 is fast approaching, so it’s time to start planning ahead to ensure you experience success next year. In this 45-minute educational webinar recording, senior sales coach Sheldon Rapoza breaks down how to create a well-rounded business plan. If you’re ready to grow your business in 2017 but aren’t sure where to start, you need to watch this webinar.

Watch this webinar recording to learn about:

  • Business planning basics – from budgeting to the SWOT analysis
  • Common challenges that prevent agents from hitting their goals
  • How to calculate your 2017 lead generation requirements
  • Areas to improve in that will help you hit your goals
  • And more!

Need Help With Your Business Plan?

Download Market Leader’s 2017 Real Estate Business Plan to get access to worksheets that will help you establish your transaction and lead goals, a marketing planning guide and samples, tools to help you track your progress throughout the year, and more!

Download the Plan
